name: Math
body:
### 线性代数
* 推荐教材和视频:
 * [Linear Algebra and Its Applications (5th Edition) by David C. Lay](https://www.amazon.com/Linear-Algebra-  Its-Applications-5th/dp/032198238X)
 * [Introduction to Linear Algebra, Fifth Edition (2016) by Gilbert Strang](http://math.mit.edu/~gs/linearalgebra/)
 * [麻省理工公开课：线性代数](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkaDjkUB34l6b2ANJdF8mTs0ObaEoY6rL)

### 概率
* 推荐教材和视频:
 * [Statistics 110: Probability](http://projects.iq.harvard.edu/stat110/home)
 * [Statistics 110: Probability](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2SOU6wwxB0uwwH80KTQ6ht66KWxbzTIo)
